headerDisplay: This plugin supports the 2018 Dyson Pure Cool (DP04, TP04), Dyson Pure Cool Link (DP01, TP02) and Dyson Hot+Cool (HP02, HP04) devices.

username.title: Username
username.description: Your email address of the Dyson account you used to register the device with in the Dyson app.

password.title: Password
password.description: Your password of the Dyson account you used to register the device with in the Dyson app.

countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: Two-letter ISO code of your country, e.g. US, DE, EN...

ipAddress.title: IP Address
ipAddress.description: Local IP address of the device.

enableAutoModeWhenActivating.title: Enable Auto Mode
enableAutoModeWhenActivating.description: If set to true, the Auto mode is enabled when you activate the device in the Home app.

isNightModeEnabled.title: Enable Night Mode
isNightModeEnabled.description: If set to true, a switch is exposed for the night mode.

isJetFocusEnabled.title: Enable Jet Focus
isJetFocusEnabled.description: If set to true, a switch is exposed for the jet focus. Only used for 2018 devices.

isTemperatureSensorEnabled.title: Enable Temperature Sensor
isTemperatureSensorEnabled.description: If set to true, a separate temperature sensor is exposed. Only used for non-heating devices. If set to false, the temperature is added as characteristic to the air purifier (does not show up in the Apple Home app).

isHumiditySensorEnabled.title: Enable Humidity Sensor
isHumiditySensorEnabled.description: If set to true, a separate humidity sensor is exposed. If set to false, the humidity is added as characteristic to the air purifier (supported in the Apple Home app).

isAirQualitySensorEnabled.title: Enable Air Quality Sensor
isAirQualitySensorEnabled.description: If set to true, a separate air quality sensor is exposed. If set to false, the air quality is added as characteristic to the air purifier (supported in the Apple Home app).
